attributes.action: Make Israel accountable for its flagrant breach of the Geneva Convention in the current Gaza conflict.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Palestine does not exist as an independent nation, so its citizens are still technically the reponsibility of Israel. In the recent conflict there has been use of phosphorus weapons against its own people, which amounts to the use of chemical weapons. The UK government was quick to condemn Saddam Hussein for similar actions. We feel that the UK government must show consistency and clearly condemn Israel  for its atrocious behaviour in the current conflict.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
